page.title: 01General Review
page.content: The l2 square kilometres within this grid are largely arable farmland with three small villages and a few scattered farmhouses. In the following pages an attempt has been made to give a view of the land, its use, ecology and history as well as the life of the people who live and work here. Their housing, education and health facilities, those for recreation and sport, their transport and employment difficulties as well a little about their home life styles and religious beliefs are all briefly written about. We have also touched on the government of the area and the communication systems that exist. It is hoped that from this information, it may be possible to envisage the life of the people of the area during the middle of the l980's.
